description:
Tsubame and the others get a day off as the dust has settled. Yuumi uses her connections to go to a hot spring deep in snow-covered mountains, and Mana and a few of the other girls set out to find a yeti. Little do they know there seems to be real evidence to support their existence.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hair-raising! Unidentified Creature Spotted in the Snowy Mountains
La terrifiante créature non identifiée des neiges !
Senritsu! Ooyukiyama ni Mikakuninseibutsu o Mita
戦慄! 大雪山に未確認生物を見た
